Food Printing: A printer can be used to create edible food by using edible ink cartridges and food-based paper.
Art Printing: A printer can be used to create art prints by using high-quality ink cartridges and paper.
Medical Printing: A printer can be used to create medical models, prototypes, and implants.
Fashion Printing: A printer can be used to create custom clothing and accessories by using ink cartridges and special paper.
Architectural Printing: A printer can be used to create detailed architectural models and blueprints.
